3: No... The operating speed of the action module continues to slow down!
Hang on! The reinforcements are arriving!
You, get away from my friend!
I won't let you hurt him!
Sorry, there are too many Corrupted on the road.
More than half of our men had their Inver-Device destroyed and ended up as food for the Corrupted...
Don't say that! We need to keep on living!
Just wait, I will bring you back... I will... We're going home together... And we will welcome our new life together... We promised.
